psychographics.lifestyle: Urban, culture-driven consumers who read fashion as a language of identity, irony, and contemporary art.
psychographics.behavior: Follows runway narratives and special projects; responds to strong silhouettes, iconic accessories, and high-visibility campaigns.

tone_of_voice.communication_style: Short, declarative and self-aware; often deliberately anti-advertising in tone.
tone_dos: Use restrained language with conceptual bite

logo.usage_rules: Use as a clean wordmark with high legibility; avoid distortion, decorative effects, or placement that compromises readability.
logo.lockup_behavior: Centered, top-aligned, or as a minimal corner signature with ample clear space.
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals the height of the wordmark cap height.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Favor monochrome and neutral greys; accent color is rare and typically product-led rather than graphic-led.

layout_principles.grid_system: Simple editorial grid; center-weighted compositions common
layout_principles.cta_placement: Rare; when present, small and neutral

style.camera_feel: Direct, confrontational portraiture; often static and observational, emphasizing silhouette and material truth.
style.pose_guidelines: Controlled stillness; minimal gesture; posture and stance carry attitude.
style.casting_attitude: Distinct personalities; community/insider casting appears alongside high-profile ambassadors.

technical.lighting: Flat-to-soft studio light or controlled interior light; minimal drama, high clarity.
technical.grain: Clean digital or subtle texture; avoid heavy stylization.
technical.depth_of_field: Moderate; enough clarity for product and silhouette read.

model_casting.attitude: Unsmiling or understated expression; self-possessed presence.

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Silhouette-first; product is visible but integrated into the figure and stance.
product_presentation.styling_approach: Signature hybrid garments, sharp silhouettes, controlled layering; avoid decorative clutter. citeturn0search9

motion_rules.transitions: Hard cuts or minimal dissolves; editorial pacing

visual_dos: Keep sets minimal to emphasize silhouette
Let product read through shape and stance

digital.tone_adjustment: Even more minimal; image-first with sparse captions.

platform_behavior.Instagram: Portrait series, deadpan slogans, minimal sets
platform_behavior.Website: Full-bleed imagery, minimal navigation, black/white hierarchy

print.cover_rules: Full-bleed portrait or minimal set; small wordmark with clear space

logo_misuse_examples: Crowded overlays on faces or key product areas
